events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for Software Development roles. Our hiring team will proceed with the next steps.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the interview process and answer any questions you might have.
Your initial screening interview has been conducted successfully. The technical skills you demonstrated are promising and we look forward to the next round.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 15th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and ensure a stable internet connection for the virtual session.
You completed the technical interview with excellent results. Your problem-solving approach and coding skills stood out during the session.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 3:00 PM UTC. This will be an opportunity to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
Your HR interview was completed successfully. All feedback points are positive and we are preparing an offer based on your skills and experience.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review the offer details carefully and let us know if you have any questions.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the offer. We are glad that the terms meet your expectations and hope to move forward soon.
We have received your acceptance of the job offer. Welcome aboard! Our team will initiate the onboarding process to get you started as soon as possible.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive access to all necessary systems and schedules for training and orientation sessions.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer role is now closed successfully. We are thrilled to have you join our engineering team and look forward to your contributions.
